title: Pouting Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A pouting face outwardly showingÂ displeasure with a person or situation. Displayed with a furrowed brow on most platforms, this emoji is com http://emojipedia.org/pouting-face/
emoji_net_data.name: pouting face

bn:00097107a: Irritated, in a temper, feeling or displaying anger.

bn:00097146a: Troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances
Troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances.

bn:00092315v: To act or speak in heightened anger.
Behave violently, as if in state of a great anger
To act or speak violently, as if in state of a great anger.
To move quickly and noisily like a storm, usually in a state of uproar or anger.

bn:00093362v: To look at or repel with a scowl or a frown.

bn:00084388v: To cry out with a shrill voice; to utter a sudden, sharp outcry, or shrill, loud cry, as in fright or extreme pain; to shriek; to screech.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry, as in joy, triumph, or exultation, or to attract attention, to animate soldiers, etc.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry.
To speak with a loud, excited voice.
To utter in a loud or distinct voice.

bn:00085702v: To feel or display contempt or disdain for something or somebody; to despise.
To feel contempt or disdain for something or somebody.

bn:00086717v: To dislike intensely due to envy.
To dislike intensely; to feel strong hostility towards.
Dislike intensely; feel antipathy or aversion towards

bn:13686327v: To madden, to anger, to frustrate.

bn:00827511n: Slipknot is the debut studio album by American heavy metal band Slipknot.

bn:00004086n: Anger is an emotional response related to one's psychological interpretation of having been threatened.
Anger is a common emotional response to real or imagined threats or harm to oneself or others, characterized by a desire, whether internalized or expressed, to engage in aggressive retaliation.

bn:00043140n: A feeling of strong dislike or hostility.
Strong aversion; intense dislike; hateful regard; an affection of the mind awakened by something regarded as unpleasant, harmful or evil.
Hatred is a deep and emotional extreme dislike.
This page is for quotations on Hatred.
The emotion of intense dislike; a feeling of dislike so strong that it demands action

apple_vendor_description: Apple's pouting face emoji is a masterclass in conveying subtle displeasure with its characteristic design. The face, rendered with smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges, features downturned lips and often narrowed eyes, creating a distinctly sulky expression. On Apple devices, the glossy 3D shading gives the face a life-like quality, making this emoji perfect for expressing mild annoyance, disappointment, or a playful sense of being grumpy.
